game:worldattribute-doffanddon-AllowArmo: Interact with armor on Armor Stands

On: Allow interaction with the armor placed on vanilla Armor Stands.
Off: Doff and Don Again actions will ignore armor on Armor Stands.
Interact with hands of Armor Stands

On: Allow interaction with items placed into the hands of vanilla Armor Stands.
Off: Doff and Don Again actions will ignore items in the hands of Armor Stands.
game:worldconfig-category-doffanddon-man:
Doff and Don Again
 - Other Mods
game:worldattribute-doffanddon-AllowMann:
On: Allow interaction with the armor placed on Mannequins from the "Mannequin Stand" mod.
Off: Doff and Don Again actions will ignore armor on Mannequins.

On: Allow interaction with the clothing placed on Mannequins from the "Mannequin Stand" mod.
Off: Doff and Don Again actions will ignore clothing on Mannequins.

On: Allow interaction with items placed into the hands of Mannequins from the "Mannequin Stand" mod.
Off: Doff and Don Again actions will ignore items in the hands of Mannequins.

On: Allow interaction with backpacks placed on Mannequins from the "Mannequin Stand " mod.
Off: Doff and Don Again actions will ignore backpacks on Mannequins.
game:worldattribute-doffanddon-DoffArmor:
On: Doff can move a player's equipped armor onto a targeted entity.
Off: Players will not be able to move equipped armor onto a targeted entity.
Allow Doffing armor to the ground

On: Doff can drop a player's equipped armor onto the ground.
Off: Players will not be able to drop equipped armor to the ground.
game:worldattribute-doffanddon-DropUnpla: Drop unplaceable armor to the ground

On: When Doffing to an entity, any armor that cannot be placed on the entity can be dropped to the ground.
Off: Armor that cannot be placed on the targeted entity will remain equipped to the player.
game:worldattribute-doffanddon-DoffCloth:
On: Doff can move a player's equipped clothing onto a targeted entity.
Off: Players will not be able to move equipped clothing onto a targeted entity.
Allow Doffing clothing to the ground

On: Doff can drop a player's equipped clothing onto the ground.
Off: Players will not be able to drop equipped clothing to the ground.
game:worldattribute-doffanddon-DropUnpla: Drop unplaceable clothing to the ground

On: When Doffing to an entity, any clothing that cannot be placed on the entity can be dropped to the ground.
Off: Clothing that cannot be placed on the targeted entity will remain equipped to the player.
game:worldattribute-doffanddon-DonArmorF:
On: Don can take armor from a targeted entity and equip it to the player.
Off: Players will not be able to equip armor from entities.
game:worldattribute-doffanddon-DonClothi:
On: Don can take clothing from a targeted entity and equip it to the player.
Off: Players will not be able to equip clothing from entities.
game:worldattribute-doffanddon-DonMiscFr: Allow Donning misc. items from entities

On: Don can take misc. items from a targeted entity and give them to the player.
Off: Players will not be able to take misc. items from entities.
game:worldattribute-doffanddon-SwapArmor:
On: Swap can exchange armor between a player and a targeted entity.
Off: Players will not be able to swap armor with entities.
game:worldattribute-doffanddon-SwapCloth:
On: Swap can exchange clothing between a player and a targeted entity
Off: Players will not be able to swap clothing with entities.
